entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
